name: Sloppy Coppy
description: You are a cop who is locating a crook, but you realize that he is not guilty after all. You must use the mouse to locate him, and then give him instructions with the arrow keys to on avoiding the other cops. Made in three hours for the Trijam #129 with my friend. Music used was here: https://darthdeus.itch.io/free-combat-music-pack-vol-1 but everything else was made by us.
